Welcome to Blue Bot!

The world's first privacy focused Discord moderation bot!

Welcome! We're thrilled to introduce you to Blue bot, a new addition to the world of Discord bots. Blue bot is a versatile and reliable moderation bot designed to help you manage your server more efficiently. What sets Blue bot apart from other bots is its commitment to privacy. Unlike many other moderation bots, Blue bot does not collect message data, which means you can trust it to keep your conversations private and secure. With Blue bot on your server, you can feel confident that your conversations will remain confidential while still enjoying all the benefits of a top-notch moderation bot. We hope you'll add Blue bot to your server today and see for yourself how it can transform your Discord experience.

Check out the rest of this site to learn more!
